features: ·Size Description: There are three sizes to choose from, 50"40"=125*100cm (For Children), 60"X50"=150*125cm (Suitable For Teenagers/Adults), 80"X60"=200*150cm (Suitable For Adults).

·Soft and Warm: The blanket is made of 100% premium microfiber polyester. which is soft, lightweight, and breathable. It's skin-friendly for everyone. Plush microfiber will bring you extra comfort and warmth. Machine washable and dryable for easy care shrinkage, No color fading, and No unraveling after washing.

·Fun Design: Cute cartoon design flannel throw blanket. The fun and colorful design features you, your favorite cartoon alien. Add a touch of decorative enchantment to your room with our fashionable and super soft throw blanket.

·Occasions: You can us drape it over a chair, couch, or bed to add an exotic stylish touch to your living room or bedroom As an air-conditioning blanket in summer and a warm blanket in winter. Suitable for bed, sofa, camping, cold cinema, or traveling.

·Perfect Gift for Any Occasion: Magnificent design for everyday use. This soft-touch Blanket is designed with true fans in mind. The blanket can also be given as gifts to families and friends on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, Mother's Day, and Valentine's Day. It not only brings warmth and comfort but also brings you or your family happiness. Remember, it's a gift that will hold up over the years.
body.description: Cute Cartoon BlanketCozy Soft and WarmThis bedding throw blanket is made of high-quality microfiber fabric. The Flannel is not easy to fall off, which brings you a more breathable, lightweight softer, and warmer feeling than other normal blankets feeling than a regular blanket throw to keep your body warm. .In 3 Sizes:S-Size: 125x100cm(50X40 inch), Suit for Kids Boys Girls; Queen-Size: 150x125 cm(60x50 inches),Suit for Adult Youth Teens or Adults ; King-Size: 200x150cm(80x60 inches),Suit for Adults. Please choose the size that suits you according to the size chart.Special Note: Due To Different Measurement Methods, The Error Is Normal Within 2-4cmDesign Description Full-frame cartoon prints, with clear patterns, are your best choice.Blankets Are Suitable For Many Occasions To Meet Your Different Needs. Cartoon blanket lightweight, easy to fold, does not take up space, and can be thrown on the sofa, bed, floor, or bench. It can be used as a picnic mat, camping quilt, travel bedspread, or bath towel. Are Good For All Seasons. Worthwhile Purchase: A bang-for-the-buck item that provides warmth, softness, exquisite patterns, perfect size, and easy care at an affordable price. It is an ideal gift if you are considering an adorable throw blanket for the family or friends. Packing : 1 x Cute Flannel Blanket.
